TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogExtent extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含日志数据的磁盘范围。

span.span: Represents a disk extent that contains log data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例将其数据存储在磁盘范围的集合中，这些范围由 实例表示。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 特定的 与确定的一个 相关联，同一 中的 对象具有相同的大小。A particular is associated with exactly one , and objects in the same are of identical size. 将以范围增量的形式在 实例中添加和移除空间。Space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 虽然 对象在磁盘上以文件的形式表示，但不应像普通文件那样移动或删除它们。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 若要删除 实例，请将其从包含它的 中移除。To delete a instance, remove it from the that contains it. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来添加和模拟日志序列中的范围。This example shows how to use the class to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然 对象在磁盘上以文件的形式表示，但不应像普通文件那样移动或删除它们。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 若要删除 实例，请将其从包含它的 中移除。To delete a instance, remove it from the that contains it. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来添加和模拟日志序列中的范围。This example shows how to use the class to add and emulate extents in a log sequence.
